Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Shenzhen Xinghongweiye Technology  CO., LTD. was established in 2005 with a registered capital of 10 million, which is a wholly-owned subsidiary of HONG KONG SKY TALENT HOLDINGS LIMITED, and its own brand is "Xinghongweiye".

Mainly engaged in cloud storage, application storage (NAS, IP-SAN), server virtualization, HPC, GPU high-performance computing, intelligent medical and other overall solutions. Products are widely used in security, education, government, radio and television, communications, Internet and other industries, based on the server field cooperation planning, and different industry manufacturers to establish long-term partnerships, to promote the formation and development of Xinghong full series of product application industry chain.

With the development of the network era and the increasing demand for data storage, we have launched ultra-large-capacity massive information storage and management solutions, customized corresponding solutions according to the characteristics and needs of different industries, broken through the single fixed mode of traditional storage solutions, and fully exerted the advantages of combining hardware and software research and development.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: With the continuous development of medical technology, modern medical means have far exceeded the traditional methods of diagnosis and treatment.  New technology allows doctors to diagnose conditions more accurately and choose more precise treatments.  For example, precision medicine can make personalized treatment plans based on a patient's genetic information and improve treatment results.  In addition, the application of new technologies such as telemedicine and big data analysis is also improving the quality and efficiency of medical services.
